ARABIC: وَلَقَدْ جِئْنَٰهُم بِكِتَٰبٍ فَصَّلْنَٰهُ عَلَىٰ عِلْمٍ هُدًى وَرَحْمَةً لِّقَوْمٍ يُؤْمِنُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: We have brought them a Book elucidating everything with knowledge, as guidance and a mercy for people who have iman.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Indeed We had brought to them a Book distinct, replete with knowledge, and guidance and grace for men who believe.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Surely We have brought them a Book which We expounded with knowledge; a guidance and a mercy to those who believe '
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: We have revealed the Book of guidance and mercy to the believers and We know all of its details.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And indeed We brought to them a Book, which We have explained in detail with a great knowledge – a guidance and a mercy for people who believe.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Certainly, We have brought to them a Book (the Qur'an) which We have explained in detail with knowledge, a guidance and a mercy to a people who believe.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And certainly We have brought them a Book which We have made clear with knowledge, a guidance and a mercy for a people who believe.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: And We have brought to them a Book that We have well distinguished, resting on knowledge, a guidance and a mercy unto a people that believe.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Verily We have brought them a Scripture which We expounded with knowledge, a guidance and a mercy for a people who believe.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: And surely We have brought them a Book which We have expounded with knowledge, a guide and a mercy for those who believe.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And assuredly We have brought unto them a book which We have detailed according to knowledge a guidance and, mercy unto a people who believe.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Certainly We have brought them a Book, which We have elaborated with knowledge, as a guidance and mercy for a people who have faith.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: For We had certainly sent unto them a Book, based on knowledge, which We explained in detail,- a guide and a mercy to all who believe.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Certainly, We have brought to them a Book (the Quran) which We have explained in detail with knowledge, - a guidance and a mercy to a people who believe.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: We have brought to them a Book which We have made plain based upon knowledge, a guidance and a mercy to believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: We have given them a Scripture, which We detailed with knowledge—guidance and mercy for people who believe.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And We had certainly brought them a Book which We detailed by knowledge - as guidance and mercy to a people who believe.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [7:52] And indeed We have brought them, that is, the people of Mecca, a Book, the Qur’ān, which We have detailed, [which] We have made clear through tidings and the Promise [of reward] and the Threat [of punishment], with knowledge (‘alā ‘ilmin is a circumstantial qualifier, in other words, ‘knowing what has been detailed in it’), a guidance (hudan is [also] a circumstantial qualifier referring to the hā’ [the suffixed pronoun of fassālnā-hu, ‘which We have detailed’]) and a mercy for a people who believe, in it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Verily We have brought them a Scripture) Allah says: We have sent them Muhammad (pbuh) with the Qur'an (which We expound with knowledge) with knowledge from Us; it is also said that this means: We have taught it, (a guidance) from error (and a mercy) from torment (for a people who believe) in Muhammad (pbuh) and the Qur'an.
